item.title: Ravenshka add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Ravenshka add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "Animals are my friends...and I don't eat my friends." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Ravenshka add a quote by Samarpan
item.description: "Wajar bagi anak burung dan binatang lain diberi makan oleh ibu mereka, tapi raja dan ratu tampaknya tak pernah dewasa, mereka menuntut diberi makan oleh yang lain seumur hidup. Kemandirian adalah sesuatu yang tak pernah mereka lakukan atau pelajari" -- Samarpan

item.title: Ravenshka add a quote by Salim A. Fillah
item.description: "Semua orang yang ada dalam hidup kita, masing-masingnya, bahkan yang paling menyakiti kita diminta untuk ada disana agar cahaya kita dapat menerangi jalan mereka" -- Salim A. Fillah

item.title: Ravenshka add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "You are too generous to trifle with me. If your feelings are still what they were last April, tell me so at once. My affections and wishes are unchanged; but one word from you will silence me on this subject for ever." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Ravenshka add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "From the very beginning— from the first moment, I may almost say— of my acquaintance with you, your manners, impressing me with the fullest belief of your arrogance, your conceit, and your selfish disdain of the feelings of others, were such as to form the groundwork of disapprobation on which succeeding events have built so immovable a dislike; and I had not known you a month before I felt that you were the last man in the world whom I could ever be prevailed on to marry." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Ravenshka add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Ravenshka add a quote by Asma Nadia
item.description: " Allah, bersama-Mu tak ada jalan buntu " -- Asma Nadia

item.title: Ravenshka add a quote by Asma Nadia
item.description: "Di setiap udara yang kau temukan, Di sana akan kau jumpai Allah yang senantiasa mendengar doamu" -- Asma Nadia

item.title: Ravenshka add a quote by Tasaro
item.description: "Tersenyumlah... Allah mencintaimu lebih dari yang kamu perlu" -- Tasaro

item.title: Ravenshka add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "He was fond of books, for they are cool and sure friends" -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Ravenshka add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "Let us study things that are no more. It is necessary to understand them, if only to avoid them." -- Victor Hugo
